Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.tasks

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.tasks.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The Task class contains the information about each individual task including the taskName , taskDescription ,if the task is recurring , and if the task is active .
    Author:
    mauro
